name: Sonic & Tails
description:
After his latest victory over Dr. Robotnik on Emerald Island, Sonic and Tails decide to end their vacation and head back to South Island. However, when they get there, the island is infested with badniks. The 2 heroes then finds who may be the cause of this: both Robotnik and his robotic rival from Little Planet named Metal Sonic have returned and they mean businesses. It's now up to Sonic and Tails to save South Island from being taken over by Robotnik and his badniks and maybe find out if there's someone else lurking in the shadows...

Instructions:

Right: Right arrow key

Left: Left arrow key

Jump: Space

Spin Attack: Down while running

Spin Dash (Sonic): Down and Space

Flying (Tails): Space while in the air

Now go and save South Island from disaster!

Good luck!
